title: Environmental Educational Classroom
description: A fully integrated environmental education system combining biogas, hydroponics, traditional farming, composting, and seedling incubation technologies.

specifications.Biogas System: Generates clean cooking gas from organic waste
specifications.Hydroponics System: NFT-based hydroponic setup for efficient soilless farming
specifications.Seedling Incubator: Mini greenhouse nursery for seed starting
specifications.Educational Use: Designed for student engagement and sustainability learning

title: Small-Scale Biogas System
description: Compact biogas system designed for small households or educational purposes, converting organic waste into clean energy and liquid fertilizer.

specifications.Fertilizer Production: 6 liters of liquid organic fertilizer per day
specifications.System Size: Small scale – suitable for homes or schools

title: Medium-Scale Biogas System
description: Efficient biogas system designed for medium-sized households or small farms, providing reliable cooking gas and organic fertilizer from daily organic waste.

specifications.Fertilizer Production: 10 liters of liquid organic fertilizer per day
specifications.System Size: Medium scale – suitable for families or small farms

title: Large-Scale Biogas System
description: Advanced large-scale biogas system suitable for farms or community use, producing substantial cooking gas and organic fertilizer from daily organic waste.

specifications.Fertilizer Production: 20 liters of liquid organic fertilizer per day
specifications.System Size: Large scale – ideal for farms, schools, or communities
specifications.Energy Source: Kitchen, agricultural and garden organic waste

features: Supports sustainable energy and waste management at scale

title: Farmers & Dairy – Biogas System
description: Specialized biogas system designed for farmers and dairy operations. Converts animal manure into clean cooking gas and organic fertilizer.

specifications.Daily Gas Output: Up to 6 hours of cooking gas
specifications.Fertilizer Production: Up to 40 liters of liquid organic fertilizer per day
specifications.Waste Input Capacity: 20-30 kg of cow or animal manure per day
specifications.System Type: Tailored for rural and agricultural households
specifications.Recommended Use: Farms with livestock or small dairy operations

features: Runs on animal manure (cow, goat, etc.)
Produces clean, renewable energy for cooking
Reduces methane emissions and environmental impact
Ideal for rural sustainability and circular agriculture

title: Bio-Toilet System
description: An eco-friendly sanitation solution that transforms human waste into clean cooking gas and organic fertilizer, promoting sustainability and hygiene.

specifications.Gas Output: 2-3 hours of clean cooking gas per day
specifications.Fertilizer Output: Up to 6 liters of liquid organic fertilizer daily

title: Biogas Water Heater
description: A compact, energy-efficient water heater that runs on biogas, providing a sustainable solution for on-demand hot water.
features: Instant hot water using clean biogas
Ideal for eco-friendly households and off-grid living

title: DEYE Battery System
description: Modular and intelligent battery system designed for solar energy storage with remote control, smart management, and safety features.

title: Deye Solar Inverter
description: High-performance hybrid inverter from Deye, ideal for solar energy systems with a smart LCD interface and multiple energy input/output options.

title: Growatt Hybrid Inverter
description: Reliable and efficient hybrid inverter from Growatt, ideal for residential solar systems with intelligent energy management and high conversion efficiency.

specifications.Protection: Overload, short circuit, reverse polarity, over/under voltage

features: Automatic switch between solar and grid power

title: Chisage Hybrid Solar Inverter
description: Versatile and robust hybrid inverter by Chisage, designed for both on-grid and off-grid solar systems with intelligent battery management and smart connectivity.

specifications.Protection: Overload, surge, short circuit, reverse polarity

features: Supports PV, battery, and utility power
Real-time monitoring via mobile app or PC

title: Grease Trap
description: High-capacity grease and oil separator designed for efficient removal of fats, oils, and grease (FOG) in commercial kitchen wastewater systems.

specifications.Application: Commercial kitchens, restaurants, food processing facilities

features: Efficient separation of grease and solids

title: Hydroponic Growing Tower
description: Vertical hydroponic growing tower system designed to grow 32 to 40 plants in less than one square meter. Easy to operate and suitable for a wide range of edible and ornamental plants.

specifications.Watering System: Drip irrigation or nutrient film technique (NFT)

features: Supports herbs, leafy greens, and vegetables
Can be used indoors or outdoors

title: Educational & Home Hydroponic System
description: A complete hydroponic system kit designed for home use and educational purposes. Ideal for growing fresh vegetables with minimal space and water usage.
features: Includes full growing and measurement tools
Ideal for leafy greens and herbs

title: Hydroponics Hanging Garden - Square System
description: Wall-mounted or stand-supported hydroponic garden system, available in two sizes, ideal for growing fresh vegetables and herbs in compact spaces.

specifications.Mounting: Wall-mount or freestanding with metal frame
specifications.Material: PVC planting channels with water tank

title: LivingBox – Mini Hydroponics Solar Greenhouse
description: A compact and self-contained hydroponic greenhouse system with solar power support. Ideal for growing fresh vegetables at home with protection from pests and weather.

title: GreenBox Series – Hydroponic System
description: A stylish and low-maintenance hydroponic system that mimics natural stone design. Uses Deep Water Culture (DWC) technique to grow plants efficiently indoors.
features: Ideal for herbs, leafy greens, and houseplants

title: HOMIE – NFT Hydroponics Mini System
description: A compact NFT-based hydroponic system designed for beginners and small spaces. Suitable for growing 8 to 16 plants using nutrient film technique.
features: Perfect for leafy greens and herbs

title: LIVINGSPACE – Combined NFT & Drip Hydroponic System
description: A dual-tech hydroponic system combining NFT and drip irrigation. Designed to optimize nutrient delivery and support large-rooted plants both indoors and outdoors.
features: Combines two irrigation techniques for efficiency
Custom nutrient flow for each plant
Suitable for herbs, vegetables, and root-heavy crops
Flexible for indoor and outdoor use

title: Small Home Greenhouse
description: A compact and durable greenhouse for home gardening, featuring UV-resistant panels and rust-proof frame. Ideal for growing plants in outdoor or indoor settings.
features: Protects plants from weather and pests
Highly transparent roof for optimal light
Suitable for vegetables, herbs, and flowers

title: 70L Home Composter
description: Efficient and compact home composter with a built-in aeration system for accelerating organic waste decomposition into rich compost.

title: 105L Home Composter
description: Large-capacity home composter with a built-in aeration system to efficiently transform organic waste into nutrient-rich compost.

specifications.Application: Home gardens, urban agriculture, sustainable living

title: 120L Home Composter
description: Vertical composting system with 120-liter capacity, featuring built-in aeration and UV-resistant structure. Converts organic waste into natural fertilizer efficiently.
features: Top lid for loading and bottom hatch for extraction

title: 140L Home Composter
description: Dual-chamber home composter with a 140-liter capacity and advanced aeration system, allowing continuous organic waste composting.

specifications.Aeration: Side air vents for accelerated decomposition

features: Easy to load, turn, and unload

title: 210L Home Composter
description: Heavy-duty dual-chamber home composter with 210-liter capacity. Designed for high-volume composting with enhanced aeration and UV protection.

specifications.Application: Large home gardens, eco-communities, educational use

features: Two separate chambers for continuous composting

title: 600L Septic Tank
description: Compact and durable 600-liter septic tank designed for small-scale wastewater treatment. Suitable for remote buildings, cabins, or eco-friendly installations.

specifications.Application: On-site sewage systems, rural housing, eco cabins

title: 300L Septic Tank
description: Durable and space-efficient 300-liter septic tank ideal for small-scale sewage treatment in homes or remote locations.

specifications.Application: Cabins, gardens, eco-toilets, decentralized waste systems

title: Smart Irrigation & Fertilization Control System
description: AI-powered smart system for automated irrigation and fertilization. Offers remote monitoring, data logging, and intelligent crop management.
features: AI-driven automation of water and nutrient delivery
Real-time alerts and historical data tracking

title: Smart Weather Control Modules
description: AI-powered environmental control modules for automating climate-sensitive operations. Ideal for smart farming, irrigation, and greenhouse automation.

specifications.Application: Greenhouses, hydroponics, smart homes, smart farms

title: Tiger Neo 78HC-BDV
description: High-performance solar panel with 650Wp front-side power and 23.3% efficiency. Designed for long-term reliability with a 30-year linear power warranty.

title: Tiger Neo 72HC
description: 605Wp solar panel with exceptional 23.4% efficiency and a 30-year linear power warranty, ideal for long-term energy projects.

title: Tiger Neo 66HC
description: 635Wp high-performance solar panel with 23.51% efficiency and long-lasting 30-year power warranty.

title: Tiger Neo 48 All Black
description: 450-475W N-Type Monofacial Module with Dual Glass. Ideal for sleek residential installations with high durability and modern aesthetics.
features: Perfect for rooftops and visible installations

title: ABB SACE Circuit Breakers
description: Low-voltage molded case and air circuit breakers from 160 to 6300A, offering advanced protection, customization, and cyber-secure operation.

specifications.Customization: Full device customization via Ekip architecture
specifications.Lifecycle: Designed for long-term evolution and upgrade

features: High efficiency and connectivity for modern grids

title: SACE Emax 2 – Power Manager
description: From a traditional circuit breaker to an all-in-one power management solution for low-voltage distribution systems.

specifications.Connectivity: 8 protocols supported, Bluetooth LE, ABB Ability™ cloud platform

features: Remote access via Bluetooth Low Energy

title: SACE Tmax T – Moulded Case Circuit Breakers
description: A complete range of moulded case circuit-breakers up to 3200 A, offering compact size, flexibility, and advanced protection features.

specifications.Breaking Capacity: High breaking capacity at multiple voltage levels
specifications.AC/DC Support: Available for both AC/DC and AC only systems

features: Compact size with high short-circuit capacity
Flexible installation and trip unit upgrade
Early Fault Detection and Prevention algorithms

title: SACE Infinitus – Solid State Circuit Breaker
description: The world’s first fully IEC 60947-2 certified Solid State Circuit Breaker (SSCB), combining protection, control, and efficiency for DC power systems up to 1250V DC and 2500A.
features: All-in-one solution for DC power systems
Ultra-fast current interruption with near-zero arc exposure
Reduces power losses by up to 70%
Ideal for renewables, marine, smart transport & buildings
Supports seamless integration with PV and BESS

title: Ekip UP+
description: The low-voltage digital unit that monitors, protects, and controls next-generation plants. Designed for full digitalization and remote upgrade via ABB Ability Marketplace™.

title: SACE FORMULA
description: Compact, cost-effective molded case circuit breakers designed for quick installation and easy use. Ideal for distribution boards requiring reliable, standardized protection.

specifications.Range (UL): A1 and A2, up to 100A and 250A

features: FORMULA Link system for simplified setup

title: Tmax Link
description: UL/CSA certified switchboard and panelboard solution that enables OEMs to assemble ABB MCCBs under their own brand with high flexibility and reduced production time.

specifications.Breaker Type: ABB Tmax XT Molded Case Circuit Breakers

features: Enables OEM branding and UL/CSA certification through ABB program
Compact and configurable design using Tmax XT MCCBs
Fast and easy to manufacture with standard components
Versatile layout options for switchboards and panelboards
Reduces financial risk and enhances production capability

title: Surge Protectors for Solar Panels
description: High-quality surge protection devices designed for solar power systems. Available for AC single-phase, AC three-phase, and DC circuits from trusted brands like GACIA, PHOENIX, and SAKO.

specifications.Usage: Solar power panels, inverters, and energy distribution boards

features: Protects sensitive solar equipment from lightning strikes and voltage spikes
Compatible with both AC and DC circuits
Compact and easy to install on DIN rail
Multiple configurations to suit various panel setups
Trusted international brands ensuring safety and durability

title: 1KW Solar Inverter
description: Compact and efficient 1KW solar inverter for small to medium off-grid or hybrid solar systems. Designed to deliver stable power output with smart protections.

title: ABB OT40F4C Manual Transfer Switch
description: Reliable manual switch (OT40F4C) used for safe and efficient power transfer applications, ideal for solar panels and industrial use.

specifications.Application: Solar systems, industrial load switching, emergency backup systems

features: Reliable manual operation for load switching
